ability.name: Molecular Rearrangement Field
ability.flavor: Your enemies' wounds open, your allies' wounds close.

metadata.flavor: Your enemies' wounds open, your allies' wounds close.

effects.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the size of your Null Field ability increases by 1. While the area of that ability is enlarged this way, each enemy who has I < AVERAGE and enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there is bleeding (save ends). Each ally who enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there gains temporary Stamina equal to your Intuition score.
